item.title: Photoshop Trending Autumn Effect 2020
item.description: Introduction Autumn effect is something now getting in trend on social medias, It’s a simple filter but most of the softwares get it wrong and making a messed up look but untrained eye isn’t going to notice that until doing some post processing. Here Let’s re-create that effect on photoshop so it’s more versatile for more adjustments. Here’s a before and after photo of me (Not the prettiest one but it worked) with the effect applied
